com.shreyaspatil.EasyUpiPayment

Class EasyUpiPayment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shreyaspatil.EasyUpiPayment.EasyUpiPayment

  • public final class EasyUpiPayment
extends Object
    Class to implement Easy UPI Payment Use EasyUpiPayment.Builder to create a new instance.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final String TAG

    • Method Detail

      • startPayment

        public void startPayment()
        Starts the payment Transaction. Calling this method launches the Payment Menu and shows installed UPI apps in device and let user choose one of them to pay.

      • setPaymentStatusListener

        public void setPaymentStatusListener(@NonNull
                                     PaymentStatusListener mListener)
        Sets the PaymentStatusListener.
        Parameters:
        mListener - Implementation of PaymentStatusListener

      • setDefaultPaymentApp

        public void setDefaultPaymentApp(@NonNull
                                 PaymentApp mPaymentApp)
        Sets default payment app for payment transaction.
        Parameters:
        mPaymentApp - Sets default payment app from Enum of PaymentApp. For e.g. To start payment with BHIM UPI then PaymentApp.BHIM_UPI PaymentApp.BHIM_UPI.

      • detachListener

        public void detachListener()
        Removes the PaymentStatusListener which is already registered.

      • isDefaultAppExist

        public boolean isDefaultAppExist()
        Checks whether specified setDefaultPaymentApp(PaymentApp) default app is exists on device or not. If not specified, returns false.
        Returns:
        true if app exists. Otherwise returns false.
